Anand writes:
> Hi,
>  
> How can I test package private classes with JUnit. Our
> test cases are generally in a "unittest" subdirectory of
> the directory where the classes being test are.

Well, one easy way is to put the tests in the same
package... You can do this, for example, by having parallel
source trees.
e.g.
  src/com/foo/...
  test/com/foo/...
